update.releaseNotes: - New! Added Interview Section to gear you up for Placement-Drive. - New! Added Reaction Tools to work with NMR and IR values. Check it out ;) - New! Main Screen Redesigned and Navigation Drawer accessible from on all screens. - App Now Supports Both Light and Dark Themes. Apply it from settings. - New! App is now translated in हिन्दी and मराठी . - App size reduced. - Updated Internal Files - Bugs Fixed.
